plugins.name: [QUON] Design Tools
plugins.description: This tool was developed to address the "little annoyances" in design work. Its main features include the ability to adjust the selected object to a specific ratio, split specific shapes, and round off decimal points. Additionally, it has functions to split text line by line or at each blank line, and to remove all line breaks. Moreover, within the scope of user-defined groups or frames, you can easily select elements based on various combinations of common properties such as width, fill, and position.
plugins.tagline: Streamline design with ratio adjustments, shape splitting, text tools, and property-based selection.

plugins.name: Harris Profile
plugins.description:
Evaluate Your Ideas According to What Matters Most to You

The Harris Profile Method is a powerful tool that enables you to evaluate your ideas and select the most suitable one. This plugin helps designers compare three ideas by scoring them based on prioritized criteria.


A Step-by-Step Guide

Write the titles of the three concepts you want to compare in the title sections above.


Determine up to 7 comparison criteria and list them in descending order of importance, from top to bottom.


During criterion evaluation, score each criterion separately for all three concepts. Possible scores are -2, -1, +1, +2:

  1. +2 if it greatly meets your requirements
  2. -2 if it doesn't meet them at all

Intermediate scores reflect partial alignment.


After scoring all criteria, examine the resulting pattern. The option with the highest green density in the top rows indicates the most suitable concept for you.


Changing the priority order of your criteria will alter the scoring pattern. To see which concept is more valuable in different situations, rearrange them with the desired criterion.


Use "Clear All Scores" to keep your concept names and criteria fixed while only clearing scores.


When ready, click the Insert button to paste the Harris Profile table directly onto your Figma canvas.


For inquiries or support, contact us at: harris.profile.plugin@gmail.com


The Harris Profile as a Design Thinking Evaluation Method

The method is based on the following sources:


  1. HARRIS, John S. The Product Profile Chart: A Graphical Means of Appraising and Selecting New Products, 1961.
  2. ROOZENBURG, Norbert F.M.; EEKELS, Johannes. Product Design: Fundamentals and Methods, Wiley, 1995.


Method Card Toolkit

YouTube Overview Video
plugins.tagline: Score & Compare Ideas Based on Custom Criteria

plugins.name: TextColor2Android
plugins.description:
该插件支持将 Figma TextNode 的颜色导出成 Android 的 colors.xml 和 Compose 的 Color.kt 格式


How to use

  1. 打开插件
  2. 选中所有你需要导出的 TextNode 节点
  3. 选择导出成 Xml or Compose 格式
  4. Copy to Clipboard


导出成 Xml 的示例

<color name="textNode1">FFFFFFFF</color>
<color name="textNode2">FF000000</color>
<color name="textNode3">40000000</color>
<color name="textNode4">D9000000</color>
<color name="textNode5">D9000000</color>


导出成 Compose Colors.kt 的示例

val textNode1 = Color(0xFFFFFFFF)
val textNode2 = Color(0xFF000000)
val textNode3 = Color(0x40000000)
val textNode4 = Color(0xD9000000)
val textNode5 = Color(0xD9000000)


Github 链接

https://github.com/sunnyswag/Color2Android


---------------------------------------------------------------------


This plugin supports exporting the color of Figma TextNodes into Android's colors.xml and Compose's Color.kt formats.


How to use

  1. Open the plugin
  2. Select all the TextNode elements you need to export
  3. Choose to export as Xml or Compose format
  4. Copy to Clipboard


Example of export to Xml

<color name="textNode1">FFFFFFFF</color>
<color name="textNode2">FF000000</color>
<color name="textNode3">40000000</color>
<color name="textNode4">D9000000</color>
<color name="textNode5">D9000000</color>


Example of export to Compose Colors.kt

val textNode1 = Color(0xFFFFFFFF)
val textNode2 = Color(0xFF000000)
val textNode3 = Color(0x40000000)
val textNode4 = Color(0xD9000000)
val textNode5 = Color(0xD9000000)


Github link

https://github.com/sunnyswag/Color2Android
plugins.tagline: Transform Figma TextNode Colors to XML and Kotlin Seamlessly

plugins.name: The Rolling Machine
plugins.description:
A simple, minimal plugin to create a consistent page structure for your files with a single click. No UI, no complexity, no fuss!


Simply start a new file and run the plugin — The Rolling Machine will automatically create pages intended to support the design process and ensure positive developer handoff:


  • 🏁 Cover
  • 🔮 Hypothesis
  • ✅ Handoff
  • 👀 Prototype
  • 🧪 Testing

——————————————

  • 💻 Research
  • ⚙️ Explorations
  • 🔀 Flows
  • 🙋 Crit / Review
  • 📜 Archive


Originally built as an internal plugin for the design team at Leafly, based on the great work of the folks at Project Scaffold — go check them out!

plugins.name: Geometric Tile Pattern SVG Generator
plugins.description:
Geometric Pattern Generator is a Figma plugin for creating beautiful, customizable geometric patterns. Built for designers who need professional-quality patterns fast, this plugin provides generation with granular control.


Key Features:


  1. Smart Generation: Instantly create unique patterns with randomized settings or manually adjust rows, columns, block size, colors, and big blocks chances
  2. Multiple Export Options: Download as PNG or SVG, or insert patterns directly into your Figma canvas as vector or raster graphics
  3. Developer-Friendly: View and copy HTML & CSS code, raw SVG markup, or URL-encoded versions for seamless web integration
  4. Smooth Workflow: Intuitive interface with real-time preview, smooth animations, and one-click generation


Perfect for creating backgrounds, textures, brand elements, or decorative graphics. Generate backgrounds for apps, websites, presentations, or print materials, get professional geometric patterns that would take hours to create manually – in just seconds.

From concept to code, this plugin bridges the gap between design and development, making it essential for modern design workflows.

plugins.name: Polaroids
plugins.description:
Polaroids – Bring a Touch of Nostalgia to Your Designs

Transform any frame into a beautifully styled Polaroid image—in seconds.


Polaroid Maker is your go-to tool for adding a warm, analog vibe to digital designs. Whether you’re building a moodboard, designing a presentation, or crafting a portfolio, this plugin helps you wrap your visuals in the charm of vintage photography.


Features:

Adjustable Padding – Control the spacing for that perfect Polaroid balance.


Customizable Corner Radius – Keep it sharp or go rounded for a softer feel.


Handwritten-style Captions – Add personality with a built-in handwriting font.


Stacking Options – Single, double, or multiple cards for layered vibes.


Shadow Effects – Add subtle or dramatic depth with three shadow styles.


Polaroid Maker was built to make visual storytelling more tactile, expressive, and fun—without needing any design hacks or frame juggling.
plugins.tagline: Turn any frame into a clean, customizable Polaroid.

plugins.name: GOST | General Organization & Structure Tool
plugins.description:
GOST | General Organization & Structure Tool


🚀 Tired of messy components and scattered layouts? GOST organizes Component Sets, UI layouts, and sections, ensuring clarity, consistency, and developer-friendly documentation.


🎯 Why Use GOST?


✅ Save time – No more manual sorting and structuring.

✅ Keep your project organized – Structured variants, grouped layouts, auto-wrapped sections.

✅ Improve documentation – Clear labels and descriptions for components.

✅ Boost consistency – Standardized component wrapping and layout structuring.


⸻


🛠️ Key Features


🔹 Structure Components


Organizes Component Sets into a labeled Variants Grid and optionally generates a documentation sheet.


✅ Options:

•Primary Axis – Arrange properties in rows or columns.

•Bake Documentation – Auto-generate a property sheet.

•Section Style – Define the visual style.

•Sort Nodes – Reorder elements inside the section.


📝 How to use:

1️⃣ Select a Component Set.

2️⃣ Run “Structure Components”.

3️⃣ Adjust sorting/documentation settings.

4️⃣ Get a structured matrix with optional documentation.


⸻


🔹 Structure Layouts


Groups and arranges layouts based on naming conventions (e.g., "chat", "chat / typing").


✅ Option:

•Section Style – Choose a predefined appearance.


📝 How to use:

1️⃣ Ensure layouts have clear names.

2️⃣ Run “Structure Layouts”.

3️⃣ The plugin organizes them.


⸻


🔹 Build Component


A faster way to apply sorting rules and documentation.


✅ Options:

•Primary Axis – Arrange variants.

•Bake Documentation – Enable/disable property sheets.


📝 How to use:

1️⃣ Select a Component Set.

2️⃣ Run “Build Component”.

3️⃣ Sorting and documentation are applied.


⸻


🔹 Wrap to Section


Neatly wraps any selection into a section, improving clarity.


✅ Options:

•Section Style – Choose a visual look.

•Sort Nodes – Reorder elements or keep positions.


📝 How to use:

1️⃣ Select frames, layers, or components.

2️⃣ Run “Wrap to Section”.

3️⃣ The plugin creates a structured section.


⸻


⚙️ Preferences & Customization


🎛️ Set default values for:

•Primary Axis – Default row/column arrangement.

•Bake Documentation – Enable/disable property sheets.

•Section Style – Standardized look for sections and layouts.


♻️ Need to reset? Restore plugin settings to default (⚠️ May affect styles).


📝 Customize:

1️⃣ Open GOST → Preferences → Select Default Values.

2️⃣ Adjust settings.

3️⃣ Plugin remembers preferences.


⸻


🚀 Quick Actions

•Rebuild Component – Instantly update a processed component set.


⸻


📩 Get in Touch!


📧 Email: kitosorgin@gmail.com

💬 Telegram: @kitosorgin
plugins.tagline: Sort component's variants, add labels and descriptions to properties in one click!

plugins.name: Timesaver: Conditionally Select, Rename, Export, Delete, Duplicate
plugins.description:
The plugin code is open-sourced on Github https://github.com/fireinureeyes/figma-timesaver-plugin


Stop doing things one by one and save time instead

Define your custom conditions and quickly filter out any subset of elements across your file.

Then choose one of the actions to bulk process them.


Example use cases

SELECT all groups not using auto layout,

RENAME all frames on the bottom half of the screen (regex allowed),

EXPORT all icons of a specific layer name format,

DELETE all masks or locked elements,

DUPLICATE and collect all components on one page,

or EXPORT A LIST of elements as a CSV file for documentation purposes.

The possibilities are endless...


Freely combine more than 80 properties to get what you need

Use logical AND and OR to build up complex conditions from:

Scope:

  1. Current page
  2. Whole document
  3. Existing selection


Object type:

  1. Components
  2. Instances
  3. Texts
  4. Shapes (rectangles, stars, lines, polygons...)
  5. Sections
  6. Vectors
  7. Groups
  8. Frames
  9. Boolean operations (unions, substracts, intersects, excludes)


General object properties:

  1. Layer name
  2. Page name
  3. Width
  4. Height
  5. X-Coordinate
  6. Y-Coordinate
  7. Visibility
  8. Rotation
  9. Number of children
  10. Nested level
  11. Number of points (paths)
  12. Locked state
  13. Mask state
  14. Export setting
  15. Overridden properties


Appearance:

  1. Rounding
  2. Fill
  3. Stroke
  4. Stroke color
  5. Opacity
  6. Blendmode
  7. Fill blendmode

137858.name: Timesaver: Conditionally Select, Rename, Export, Delete, Duplicate
137858.description:
The plugin code is open-sourced on Github https://github.com/fireinureeyes/figma-timesaver-plugin


Stop doing things one by one and save time instead

Define your custom conditions and quickly filter out any subset of elements across your file.

Then choose one of the actions to bulk process them.


Example use cases

SELECT all groups not using auto layout,

RENAME all frames on the bottom half of the screen (regex allowed),

EXPORT all icons of a specific layer name format,

DELETE all masks or locked elements,

DUPLICATE and collect all components on one page,

or EXPORT A LIST of elements as a CSV file for documentation purposes.

The possibilities are endless...


Freely combine more than 80 properties to get what you need

Use logical AND and OR to build up complex conditions from:

Scope:

  1. Current page

  3. Existing selection

plugins.name: Drag & Drop FPO
plugins.description:
Drag & Drop FPO : Anywhere in your layout


As the name suggest, drag & drop the FPO marker over the content or images in your layout that are placeholder content. It helps communicate within the internal team or the clients or dev team, as to which content will be updated in future.


If your designs are in Auto-Layout, the dropped "FPO" will be positioned "ABSOLUTE" and won't interfere within the set auto-layout.


"FPO" placed over the frame without the auto-layout will appear on top-left corner.


Feel Free to reach out with any Feedback, thanks for using the plugin !

plugins.name: Color Code Extractor
plugins.description:
Color Code Extractor helps you identify and extract all color codes used in your selected Figma frames, making it easier to maintain design consistency and build design systems.


✨ FEATURES:


• Extract all color codes from selected frames, groups, or individual nodes


• View colors in a visual grid with hex codes for easy reference


• Copy any color code to clipboard with a single click


• Handles both fill and stroke colors automatically


• Supports opacity/alpha channel in color codes


• Works with multiple selections simultaneously


🎯 PERFECT FOR:


• Design system documentation


• Creating color palettes from existing designs


• Ensuring color consistency across projects


• Handoff to developers


• Auditing designs for color usage


Simply select any frame, group, or node in your design, run the plugin, and instantly see all colors used. No more manually inspecting elements or guessing which colors are being used where!


Color Code Extractor is lightweight, fast, and works entirely within Figma - no external services required.

plugins.name: Lingoport Localyzer
plugins.description:
Fast-track your FIGMA design work for translation via Lingoport’s FIGMA connector to Localyzer. Lingoport provides a full range of continuous localization solutions. Translate now with an automated process, whether with humans or machines, so that localization moves at the speed of development. Use machine translation or pseudo-localize so you can immediately see how your U/I will look in target languages. For more information, visit https://lingoport.com.



Getting Started

To get started, you will need a Lingoport Command Center API user account and at least one project set up with Localyzer. To set up an account, please contact us.


Launch The Plugin

1. Open your Figma design file.

2. Go to Plugins and select Lingoport Localyzer.

3. Log in with your Command Center username, generated API token, and URL to the server you are connecting to.

4. Select one of your existing Command Center projects to connect to the Figma file.

6. Select "Finish Setup" to save the selected project.


Using The Plugin

When setup is complete, you can start using the plugin by exporting selected strings to your saved Command Center project. Once translations are complete on Command Center, you can translate your Figma designs into your target languages.



Need Help?

Please contact us at figma@lingoport.com for any questions or assistance.

accepted.description: Since 2001, Lingoport has been helping companies internationalize and localize their software using our suite of products and expert i18n services.

plugins.name: Storylane: Turn Figma into AI-interactive demos
plugins.description:
From Figma screens to killer product demos - powered by AI


Convert your Figma designs into interactive product demos in just a few clicks. Storylane lets you build personalized, AI-enhanced demos directly from your Figma frames - ready for sales, marketing, and presales teams to share across channels.


How it works?

1. Download and open the Storylane plugin

Install the Storylane plugin and open it in your Figma file.

2. Choose which Figma frames to export

Select All frames or just the ones you've highlighted.

3. Pick your destination and click “Create New Demo"

Instantly export your frames to a new demo or to an existing one in Storylane.

4. Fine-tune and enhance with AI features in the Storylane editor

Add voiceovers, guides, personalization, and more — no code needed.

5. Share the interactive demo across channels and track engagement

Embed on websites, use in emails, or send in sales calls — with real-time analytics.


Benefits

  1. Gather actionable feedback before development begins
  2. Showcase the product with just mockups when pitching to investors
  3. Connect design, marketing and sales with a single source of truth


Popular features

  1. AI demo creation - Add professional voiceovers, guides, and annotations in seconds
  2. 6+ guide types - Multiple guide types available to create the perfect interactive experience
  3. Instant personalization - Personalize content to prospects without rebuilding demos
  4. AI video avatars - Choose lifelike stock avatars or your replicas to narrate your product story
  5. Multilingual capability - Create demos in 25+ languages with 63+ voice options
  6. Multi-chapter demos - Create choose-your-own-adventure experiences so buyers can explore what matters most to them
  7. Lead generation - Use native or custom lead forms to collect leads at the right moment
  8. Conversion boosters - Add always-available CTAs that significantly increases CTR rate


Deploy anywhere

  1. Embed on websites to convert visitors
  2. Attach to emails for higher engagement
  3. Create immersive offline event experiences
  4. Share as leave-behinds after sales calls
  5. Build custom demo hubs for buying committees


Join 4000+ marketing and sales teams who use Storylane to turn designs into measurable business impact.

Proof of trust - 600+ reviews and the highest satisfaction rating on G2.


First time using Storylane?

See how it works by exploring our interactive product demo or sign up for a free account to get started right away.

plugins.name: Get in Line — Round off decimals in XY Coordinates, Width & Height
plugins.description:
Tired of those annoying decimal values in your Figma designs? Get in Line is here to straighten things up! 💯


Whether it's X/Y coordinates, Width, or Height, this plugin rounds off all decimal values to the nearest integer in just one click — making your designs pixel-perfect. No more awkward X: 325.49 or Width: 543.8. With Get in Line, you'll get clean, crisp values like X: 325 and Width: 544. ✨


💥 What It Does:

✅ Round off X/Y Coordinates — Converts decimal positions into whole numbers.

✅ Round off Width & Height — Keeps your shapes, frames, and elements mathematically perfect.

✅ Multi-Select Support — Select multiple elements and fix them all at once.

✅ Instant Feedback — Know how many elements were aligned after each click.


🚀 Why Use It?

Pixel Perfection: No more blurry layers caused by decimal positions.

Design Hygiene: Clean, rounded dimensions keep your layout sharp.

Speed Up Workflow: Align multiple elements in one go.

No More OCD Triggering Numbers: Forget about X: 135.72 — now it's X: 136. 😎


💡 How It Works:

Select one or more elements (Frames, Shapes, SVGs, anything!).

Hit the "Align" button in the plugin.

Boom! All decimal values in X, Y, Width, and Height are instantly rounded off.

You'll get a notification showing how many elements were aligned. 🎉

💎 Get in Line is perfect for product designers, UI/UX designers, and anyone who craves that perfect, integer-based alignment. Whether you're building a design system, creating components, or fine-tuning layouts — this plugin will keep your designs clean and crisp.


👉 Click 'Open' and make your elements fall in line! 🚶‍♂️✨

accepted.name: Shubhransh Bhaskar
accepted.description: Sharing my learnings through YouTube — Finding inspiration through Photography — Focused on creating a therapeutic experience.

plugins.tagline: Convert decimals into integers for Position XY Coordinates, Width & Height at once!

plugins.name: Contrast checker
plugins.description:
Contrast Checker is a Figma plugin designed to help designers ensure their designs are accessible by automatically analyzing text and background color contrast within selected frames. The plugin checks for compliance with accessibility standards, highlights potential issues, and provides detailed reports, enabling you to create inclusive and user-friendly designs effortlessly.



What the Plugin Does


•Automatic Contrast Analysis: The plugin scans selected frames to identify text elements and their background colors, calculating the contrast ratio between them.

•Accessibility Compliance: It checks whether the contrast ratios meet the WCAG (Web Content Accessibility Guidelines) standards, specifically for normal and large text.

•Detailed Reports: After analysis, the plugin generates a comprehensive report that highlights any text elements that do not meet the required contrast ratios, providing actionable feedback.

•Issue Highlighting: Users can locate specific elements with contrast issues directly within their design by using the “Locate” feature.

•Ignore Option: If certain elements are intentionally designed with lower contrast, users can choose to ignore those specific issues.



How to Use the Plugin


1.Select a Frame: Start by selecting the frame or frames within your Figma document that you want to analyze.

2.Run the Plugin: Launch the Contrast Checker plugin. It will automatically start analyzing the selected frame(s).

3.View the Report: Once the analysis is complete, view the detailed report generated by the plugin. This report will list all the text elements within the frame(s) and indicate whether they meet the required contrast ratio.

4.Address Issues: Use the “Locate” button to find and fix elements with contrast issues in your design.

5.Manage Issues: Optionally, ignore any issues that you don’t need to fix by using the “Ignore” feature.



Limitations


•Text Detection: The plugin only analyzes visible text elements and solid background colors. It may not correctly analyze text with gradient backgrounds, images, or complex overlays.

•Performance: The plugin performs best on smaller frames or a limited number of selected frames at once. Analyzing very large frames with numerous text elements may take longer.

•Customization: Currently, the plugin does not support custom contrast thresholds beyond the WCAG standards, and it does not provide options for customizing the analysis parameters.


By using the Contrast Checker, designers can ensure their work is accessible, improving the overall inclusivity of their designs.
plugins.tagline: boost accessibility w/ seamless contrast checks — ensure every design is inclusive & user-friendly!

plugins.name: List Texts, Select Text
plugins.description:
Keep your text layer names tidy and unique.


Easily list all of the text elements on the current page by their Frame and Element name. Click on the name to select that text element to edit it.


Getting Started:

  1. The plugin will automatically display the current page you are on and list all text elements on that page
  2. The list format is [Closest Parent Frame Name]::[Text Element Name]
  3. Click on an item in the list to easily select that item
  4. This plugin will also display a "DUPE" warning for elements that have the same name


This plugin was built to help maintain unique key names for Lokalise exports.


Free

This plugin is free!
plugins.tagline: Keep your text layer names tidy and unique. List all layers then select with this tool.

plugins.name: StuDocreator
plugins.description:
A small text generator for books, courses and documents.


To generate this text, simply have text fields selected and click on whichever data you want to generate.


Example: If you want to generate a Document Title, select a text field and click on the 'Title' button under the 'Documents' section.

If you want to generate a Book Author, select a text field and click on the 'Author' button under the 'Books' section.


If you would like to generate all the data of a section, for example the Title, Course and Institution of a Document, you need to have three text fields selected each named appropriately. The fields should be named by section and type, so section_type


Example. Select 3 text fields named

  1. document_title
  2. document_course
  3. document_institution

And click on the Document button in the Documents tab. This will generate all information into these text fields.

plugins.name: CarouselCraft
plugins.description:
Diga adeus à criação manual de carrosséis! O CarouselCraft é o plugin definitivo para automatizar seu fluxo de trabalho no Figma, transformando dados JSON ou simples ideias em carrosséis completos e prontos para postar.


Passe menos tempo em tarefas repetitivas e mais tempo criando designs incríveis.


✨ Principais Funcionalidades


Criação via JSON: Cole uma estrutura de dados e veja o plugin montar carrosséis inteiros, com tema e textos, em um piscar de olhos.

Múltiplas Variações de Layout: Crie até 11 templates de design (`Cover-0`, `Content-0`, etc.) e teste diferentes estilos com facilidade.

Nomenclatura Inteligente: Seus frames são nomeados e organizados automaticamente, prontos para exportação.

Posicionamento Automático: O plugin alinha todos os slides e carrosséis perfeitamente na sua página.


---


🤖 Gere Conteúdo com IA (IA Craft)


Está sem ideias? Deixe nossa IA trabalhar por você! A funcionalidade IA Craft gera conteúdo para carrosséis completos com base em seus temas e público-alvo.


Plano Gratuito: Você pode gerar até 3 carrosséis usando a IA para testar todo o seu poder, a criação via Json é ilimitada

Plano Creator (R$ 12,90/mês): Gere carrosséis com IA de forma ilimitada e acelere sua produção de conteúdo como nunca antes.


---


🚀 Como Começar


1. Crie sua Conta: Para usar a automação e a IA, você precisa de um token de acesso. Crie sua conta gratuita em: https://carouselcraft.klotar.studio/

2. Prepare seus Templates: No Figma, crie seus frames com nomes numéricos (ex: `Cover-0`, `Content-0`, `End-0`).

3. Execute o Plugin: Abra o CarouselCraft, insira seu token, cole seu JSON ou use a aba "🤖 IA Craft".

4. Clique e Crie: Pronto! Seus carrosséis serão gerados instantaneamente.


O CarouselCraft é a ferramenta perfeita para social media, designers de UI/UX e criadores de conteúdo que buscam eficiência e consistência.
plugins.tagline: O fim do trabalho manual. Crie carrosséis perfeitos para Instagram em segundos.

plugins.description:
Key features:

- Generates unique IDs for your selected frames

- Naming structure: section-project-00000 (5 random digits)

- Intuitive and easy-to-use interface


How it works:

1. Select the frames you want to name

2. Open the plugin and fill in the fields:

- Section: Define the part of the project (e.g., "home", "about", "products")

- Project Nomenclature: Enter your project's code or abbreviation

3. Click "Generate" and you're done! Your selected frames will have new unique names


Perfect for:

- Maintaining consistent nomenclature in large projects

- Facilitating collaboration in design teams

- Improving organization and workflow in Figma


Streamline your workflow and keep your Figma files organized with Frame ID Generator.

plugins.name: Tailwind Tokens - Create Tailwind CSS Variables & Styles
plugins.description:
Tailwind Tokens – Create Tailwind CSS with Figma in One Click


Tailwind Tokens is your bridge between Tailwind CSS and Figma’s variables & styles. No more copy-pasting. No more design drift. Just clean, synced Tailwind CSS in seconds.


🎯 What it does

Automatically turns your entire Tailwind token set into native Figma variables and styles.


✨ Key Features

  1. Full Tailwind support – Covers every token category.
  2. One-click generation – Instantly create or update variables and styles.
  3. Selective sync – Only update what you need by category or individual token.
  4. Auto-scoped variables – Tokens are auto-scoped into Figma's variables.
  5. Safe & non-destructive – Updates existing styles without overwriting.
  6. Token management – Rename, reset, delete, or track custom tokens.


🚀 Why it matters

Cut hours of repetitive work. Eliminate errors. Keep code and design in perfect harmony.

Tailwind Tokens brings your system to life. Fast, accurate, effortless.


This is an UNOFFICIAL plugin for Tailwind CSS. It is not affiliated with, endorsed by, or supported by Tailwind Labs Inc. or Figma Inc.

plugins.name: Copy-writer agent
plugins.description:
Content Writer Agent: Your Content AI Text Assistant in Figma


Tired of manually tweaking text, fixing typos, translating snippets, or shortening

content within your Figma designs? Content Writer Agent brings the power of

advanced AI directly into your workflow, saving you time and boosting your creativity!

Select any text layers, give a simple instruction (like "Make this more formal",

"Translate to German", "Fix grammar", or "Summarize"), and let the AI handle the

heavy lifting. See the changes side-by-side, compare with the original, and replace

text with a single click.


Key Features:

  1. AI-Powered Editing: Use prompts to rewrite, translate, fix grammar,
  2. shorten, or modify selected text layers.
  3. Side-by-Side Diff: Clearly see the original text and the AI-generated
  4. suggestion, with deletions highlighted.
  5. One-Click Replace: Update single or multiple text layers in your Figma file
  6. instantly.
  7. One-Step Undo: Easily revert any replacement back to the previous text.
  8. Flexible LLM Support: Choose between Google's Gemini (requires API
  9. key) or a self-hosted Ollama instance with your favorite local models. (OpenAI
  10. coming soon!)
  11. Easy Configuration: Simple settings panel to manage your LLM provider
  12. and credentials.
  13. Light & Dark Mode: Adapts automatically or lets you choose via settings.
  14. Free Tier: Get started with 10 free AI generations per day!


Who is it for?

  1. UI/UX Designers: Quickly iterate on microcopy, button labels, and placeholder
  2. Copywriters & Marketers: Draft, refine, and translate marketing copy directly
  3. within design mockups.
  4. Content Creators: Ensure consistency and clarity in text across designs.
  5. Anyone who works with text in Figma!


Getting Started & Configuration Guide

  1. Install: Install the "Content Writer Agent" plugin from the Figma Community.
  2. Run: Right-click on the Figma canvas -> Plugins -> Content Writer Agent.
  3. Basic Use:
  4. Select one or more text layers in your Figma file. The plugin UI will update automatically.
  5. Enter a prompt in the input field (e.g., "Make this punchier").
  6. Click "Generate".
  7. Review the original and generated text in the cards.
  8. Click "Replace" on a card to update that specific text layer in Figma, or
  9. "Replace All Valid" to update all cards with valid generated text.
  10. If you replaced text, an "Undo" button appears allowing you to revert that specific change.
  11. Configure Your AI Provider (Settings):
  12. Click the Settings icon ( ) in the plugin header or the clickable provider tag next to it.
  13. Choose Provider: Select "Gemini", "Ollama", "OpenAI", or "Custom Model..." from the "LLM Provider" dropdown.

a) Gemini Setup:

  1. Select "Gemini" in the dropdown.
  2. You need a Google AI API Key. You can get one for free from Google
  3. AI Studio.
  4. Click the "Get your Gemini API Key" link or visit https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey.
  5. Copy your generated API key.
  6. Paste the key into the "Gemini API Key" input field in the plugin settings.
  7. Click "Apply Settings".

b) Ollama Setup:

  1. Select "Ollama" in the dropdown.
  2. Ensure Ollama is Installed & Running: You need Ollama running on
  3. your local machine or a reachable server. If you haven't installed it, visit ollama.com.
  4. Enter Server URL: Input the URL where your Ollama server is running (default is http://localhost:11434 ).
  5. Fetch & Select Model: Click the "Refresh" button ( ) next to the URL field. The plugin will attempt to connect and fetch the list of models available on your Ollama server. Select the desired model (e.g., llama3:latest , mistral:latest ) from the "Model Name" dropdown.
  6. (IMPORTANT) CORS Configuration: If fetching models fails (especially with Failed to fetch errors), your Ollama server likely needs CORS configuration to allow requests from Figma. See the detailed instructions within the settings panel error message for help.
  7. Click "Apply Settings".


Need Help or a Custom Model?

If you encounter issues, need support for a different model/provider, or have

feedback, please reach out!

Request Custom Model/Provider: Select "Custom Model..." from the LLM

Provider dropdown in Settings and use the contact link.

General Support/Feedback: Email ahmmigo0@gmail.com

Stop wasting time on repetitive text edits. Install Content Writer Agent and let AI

accelerate your design workflow!
plugins.tagline: Your Content AI Text Assistant in Figma (Choose your prefered LLM model)

  6. (IMPORTANT) CORS Configuration: If fetching models fails (especially with Failed to fetch errors), your Ollama server likely needs CORS configuration to allow requests from Figma. See the detailed instructions within the settings panel error message for help.
  7. Click "Apply Settings".


Need Help or a Custom Model?

If you encounter issues, need support for a different model/provider, or have

feedback, please reach out!

Request Custom Model/Provider: Select "Custom Model..." from the LLM

Provider dropdown in Settings and use the contact link.

General Support/Feedback: Email ahmmigo0@gmail.com

Stop wasting time on repetitive text edits. Install Content Writer Agent and let AI

accelerate your design workflow!

plugins.name: Monica 文案翻译
plugins.description:
Monica UI Translator: Your AI-Powered UI Translation Assistant


Effortlessly translate your Figma UI texts with the power of AI. Monica UI Translator is designed to help designers and developers quickly translate their interface content while maintaining context and design integrity.


🌟 Key Features:

• Batch Translation: Select a frame and translate all text elements at once

• Context-Aware: AI understands the UI context for more accurate translations

• Visual Preview: See and verify translations before applying them

• Flexible API Integration: Use your preferred AI service provider

• Easy Settings: Simple configuration with your own API endpoint and key


🎯 Perfect for:

• International UI/UX design teams

• Localization projects

• Design system maintenance

• Multi-language product development


💡 How to use:

1. Configure your API settings (one-time setup)

2. Select a frame containing text elements

3. Choose your target language

4. Review and apply translations with one click

plugins.name: Moospire
plugins.description:
Description for Moospire Figma Plugin;

Moospire’s Figma plugin is designed to revolutionize how you create and curate moodboards. Whether you're sourcing inspiration from the web or harnessing the power of AI to bring your unique visions to life, this plugin is ideal for designers seeking an efficient way to visualize and consolidate design concepts directly within your Figma projects.


What to Expect from the Moospire Figma Plugin

1. Seamless Web Curation:

This feature allows you to explore and curate moodboards by compiling the most inspiring and relevant content found across the web. Whether you're looking for design trends, color schemes, or visual ideas, Moospire makes it easy to gather these elements directly into your Figma workspace.


2. AI-Powered Creation:

Transform your thoughts into beautifully cohesive moodboards with just a few clicks. Submit your concepts via text, images, sketches, or even voice notes, and watch as Moospire’s AI effortlessly crafts these inputs into structured moodboards. This feature is particularly beneficial for capturing the essence of spontaneous ideas and turning them into actionable designs.


How to Use the Moospire Figma Plugin

Installation: Begin by installing the Moospire plugin from the Figma plugin store.

Launching Moospire: Access Moospire directly within your Figma project by navigating to the plugin section and selecting Moospire.

Searching and Curating: Use the search feature to find web content or let Moospire suggest materials based on search & past preferences.

Creating with AI: Upload your creative inputs through the plugin’s interface, and specify the type of moodboard content you need. The AI will process your inputs and generate a moodboard ideas right within your Figma canvas.
plugins.tagline: The Spark you need to create

plugins.name: Batch Description Update
plugins.description:
Adding a description to your Figma's components brings some benefits. When it comes to icons, adding terms and tags can help users find icons in the asset panel. However, maintaining component descriptions can be a lot of work, especially for a long set of icons. This plugin allows users to update all component descriptions with three clicks.

  • Create a .CSV file where the first column is the component name and the second is the desired description;
  • Run the plugin 'Batch Description Update', select the .CSV file, and run the process;
  • Done! Your components have their descriptions updated in no time.

plugins.name: 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant
plugins.description:
Introduction

Slice Export Assistant is a powerful Figma plugin designed specifically for designers to efficiently export selected design elements. Whether you're working on web designs, mobile applications, or icon creation, Slice Export Assistant caters to your diverse needs.


Function Description

  1. Multiple Format Support: Export your designs in various formats including PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, and WEBP.
  2. Multi-Scale Exporting: Easily set different export scales with automatic increments to save your time.
  3. Custom Suffixes: Assign custom suffixes to each exported file to ensure consistent and organized file naming.
  4. Batch Exporting: Export multiple files at once and automatically generate a ZIP archive for easy downloading and management.
  5. WEBP Conversion: Built-in WEBP format conversion to enhance image optimization efficiency.


How to Use

  1. Select Elements: In Figma, select one or more design elements you wish to export.
  2. Run the Plugin: Right-click on the selected elements, navigate to Plugins > Slice Export Assistant > Export.


Configure Options

  1. Choose Format: Select the desired export format from PNG, JPG, SVG, PDF, or WEBP.
  2. Set Scale and Suffix: Add the required export scales. Each time you click the "Add" button, the scale automatically increments.
  3. Customize Suffixes: Modify or remove suffixes as needed to fit your naming conventions.
  4. Export: Click the Export button. The plugin will export the files based on your settings—downloading single files directly or packaging multiple files into a ZIP archive for download.


Precautions

  1. Ensure Correct Selection: Make sure to select the elements you want to export on the canvas; otherwise, the plugin cannot perform the export.
  2. Browser Compatibility: WEBP format conversion relies on the browser's Canvas support. Ensure your browser is compatible.
  3. File Naming: When customizing suffixes, avoid using special characters to ensure the validity of file names.


介绍

切图助手是一款强大的Figma插件，专为设计师打造，帮助您高效地导出选中的设计元素。无论是网页设计、移动应用还是图标制作，切图助手都能满足您的多样化需求。


功能说明

  1. 多格式支持：支持导出PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF和WEBP等多种格式。
  2. 多倍数导出：轻松设置不同的导出倍数，并自动递增，节省您的时间。
  3. 自定义后缀：为每个导出文件设置自定义后缀，确保文件命名规范。
  4. 批量导出：支持一次导出多个文件，并自动生成ZIP压缩包，方便下载和管理。
  5. WEBP转换：内置WEBP格式转换功能，提升图片优化效率。


使用方法

  1. 选择元素：在Figma中选择一个或多个需要导出的设计元素。
  2. 运行插件：右键点击选择的元素，导航至Plugins > 切图助手 Slice Export Assistant > Export。


设置选项

  1. 选择格式：从PNG、JPG、SVG、PDF或WEBP中选择导出格式。
  2. 设置倍数和后缀：添加所需的导出倍数，每次点击“添加”按钮，倍数自动递增。
  3. 自定义后缀：根据需要修改或删除后缀内容。
  4. 导出：点击导出按钮，插件将根据设置导出文件，单文件直接下载，多文件打包为ZIP下载。


注意事项

  1. 确保选择正确：请先在画布上选中要导出的元素，否则插件无法执行导出操作。
  2. 浏览器支持：WEBP格式转换依赖于浏览器的Canvas支持，请确保您的浏览器兼容。
  3. 文件命名：自定义后缀时，请避免使用特殊字符，以确保文件名的有效性。
